projects.name: Poppin Soda
projects.description: This website was a project I created for my senior project.  The goal of this project was to learn something I have never done up to that point in my schooling.  I wanted to earn React, so I found a course online and started learning React a month before even beginning my project.  The site is a mock of a soda business website.  It has a functional cart, checkout, and review section.  Feel free to play around with it!

projects.name: Article Title
content: There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman! There was a crazy woman!

projects.name: Article Title 2
content: In a Galaxy Far Far away
